text: This is a list of rivers in Suriname. This list is arranged by where the river drains. Tributaries are indented under each larger stream's name. ==Atlantic Ocean== *Marowijne River **Tapanahony River ***Paloemeu River **Gonini River **Lawa River ***Litani River ****Oelemari River *Suriname River **Commewijne River ***Cottica River **Brokopondo Reservoir ***Gran Rio *Saramacca River *Coppename River *Nickerie River *Corantijn River **Kabalebo River **Lucie River **Sipaliwini River **Kutari River *Coeroeni River ==References== *Rand McNally, The New International Atlas, 1993. Suriname Suriname Category:Geography of Suriname Rivers
title: List of rivers of Suriname
